name: QOF Generator
short_description: Generates the C source code for Query Object Framework objects and provides a test environment linked against QOF to query objects, store in XML and export into SQL files. Create the fundamental object code from XML exported by any other QOF project.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
